item.title: Research - ASRG Prague Group
item.description: As the main contact of the ASRG Prague Group, I will be presenting a series of events, focused on Automotive Security. List to be updated with more information, as the events happen. Event 1: ASRG Prague Meetup: Vehicle (In)Securities - Part 1 Event Link LinkedIn Link
